metadata.title: CVE-2023-4385 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in dbFree in fs/jfs/jfs_dmap.c inthe journaling file system (JFS) in the Linux Kernel. This issue may allowa local attacker to crash the system due to a missing sanity check.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-192.203
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-192.203
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-192.203
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-192.203
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-192.203
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-126.142~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-126.142~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-126.142~18.04.1

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
